A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the worst Star Wars movie to date....Terrible story line.  Luke kills a child? Leia flies through space? Luke is a washed up wuss? Who is Rey meant nothing? Who is Snoke meant nothing? I could have written and directed a better film than this.  This movie ruined the whole franchise...The Last Jedi is far worse than any prequel.
